teaser: Market volatility, HBO going rogue, and companies freezing female employee's eggs.
title: Brunch: HBO going rogue, markets swinging, frozen eggs
contentencoded:
This week, Lizzie O'Leary sits down for brunch with Business Insider's Joe Weisenthal and Nicholas Carlson to discuss the economic news of last week and what's on their plate this week (get it?).

Topics:

Global stock markets stage rally as volatility continues 

Facebook and Apple to pay for female employees to freeze their eggs

‘Friends’ and Enemies: Netflix and HBO Battle for the Future of TV
